譚嗣同.definition: Tan Sitong (1865-1898), Qing writer and politician, one of the Six Gentlemen Martyrs 戊戌六君子 of the unsuccessful reform movement of 1898

譚富英.definition: Tan Fuying (1906-1977), Beijing opera star, one of the Four great beards 四大鬚生|四大须生

譚詠麟.definition: Alan Tam (1950-), Hong Kong Canto-pop singer and actor

譚震林.definition: Tan Zhenlin (1902-1983), PRC revolutionary and military leader, played political role after the Cultural Revolution
